content: Hello, what sort of features are lacking for the dotnet-wasmtime package that keeps it in a preview version? Is it just waiting until a 1.0.0 release? In which case, I have a few more questions.. The wasmtime runtime released version 0.21.0 in November, but dotnet-wasmtime is still on 0.20.0-preview. Do the version numbers not line up, or is it simply behind? Is there a roadmap of expected 1.0.0 release if that is required for the dotnet-wasmtime package to come out of preview? I really like the look of this runtime; I just need a bit more guidance on the .NET support from the core team.

Hi Will! I'm sorry I missed this message while I was on holiday and just noticed it now. I hope the answer I provided via the GitHub issue was sufficient. Please feel free to directly mention me regarding .NET and Wasmtime in the future!
Thanks, your answer did help me a lot.
